_sText:
I originally made this map for CS:GO and it was requested that I port it over for use in CS:S.

Thanks to Darnias I was able to use his Unreal textures in CS:S which made this port possible.

Original map for CS:GO can be found here: http://csgo.gamebanana.com/maps/188036<br></span>


I forgot to flag the trigger_push for clients and had to re-upload a new version of the map. If the magnetic rail isn't working, just re-download the map.
